key_title: Key to the subspecies of Eremophila glabra

breadcrumbs.key_title: Key to the genera of Myoporaceae
Key to the species of Eremophila

source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Myoporaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Myoporaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Stems with raised glabrous lines decurrent from petiole bases; leaves usually more than 4 mm wide; shrub more or less erect, usually more than 0.5 m high; fruit 7.5–9 mm long, 6.6–8.5 mm wide

Stems lacking raised glabrous lines decurrent from petiole bases; leaves usually 1.7–4 mm wide; shrub low, spreading, usually less than 0.5 m high, occassionaly to 1 m; fruit 5.5–7 mm long, 4.2–6 mm wide
